# Fonts

All the fonts sizes available on the design system

They have some rules to follow just like the colors, the smallest font size is 14px and the step 6px, today, we work with 8 text elements, being

small, p, h6, h5, h4, h3, h2, h1

the current font size table is the following

|Element|Size(px)|
|----|----|
|h1|56px|
|h2|50px|
|h3|44px|
|h4|38px|
|h5|32px|
|h6|26px|
|p1|20px|
|small|14px|
